alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, eastern Vinton and western Athens Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buchtel, or near Nelsonville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Nelsonville, Glouster, Mcarthur, Albany, Lake Hope State Park, Chauncey, Buchtel, Jacksonville, Murray City, Trimble, Zaleski, Radcliffe, Stroud Run State Park, Carpenter and The Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio.
